text:
My purpose in life is to
have a positive impact
on the society I live in.

Growing up in
Jerusalem, I've come

to see diversity from a
very close look from a very

And I learned not
only that it is

possible to communicate
with someone who

is different than you, but that
beautiful things can come out

And my mission is to
create a society that

is not only inclusive
but also wants

to incorporate many, many
different people in it.
